title: Raccoon Retail
description: Raccoon Retail is a funny simulation game where you play as a raccoon who works in the supermarket as a janitor. Customers are constantly creating a mess, and it's your job to keep the store clean. Drive around the store, collect the trash, then dispose of it in the dumpster. The faster you clean, the more money you can earn to upgrade your retail store and boost your revenue. Keep the store tidy and watch your profits grow!
